column4: hiya how can i mount a mac hdd ... i have a usb mac hdd but when i plug it ... it doesn't mount
not sure but you might need to have hfsutils
i can mount any other hdds but only this one not sure its ubuntu can't read mac systems or what ... there might be some command with mount ... as dmesg shows /dev/sda1 /dev/sda2 as mac ...
i have hfsutils installed already ... how can i mount it now \/
